showScoreExcerpt:
"Horn and Yazbek have wisely re-invented the identical story, creating twists and turns at all the key moments in the plot...Director Scott Ellis has cast the show impeccably and moved it along smoothly...Everything is performed beautifully by a very gifted and attractive cast, and the icing on the cake is leading player Santino Fontana...There are a number of minor disappointments along the way. David Yazbekâ€™s score is far more successful on the lyrical side."
